name: Breakthrough (Trijam 85)
description:
The point of the game is to avoid different elements of the track. In case you manage to reach hyperspeed, you can break through the brick wall, but even then you have to be careful of the insidious spikes. You can get the fuel needed for hyperspeed from the barrels on the track.
Control: A-left, D-right, W-acceleration.
Credit:
music: https://opengameart.org/content/space-dimensions-8bitretro-version
